backtest_reality.note: 62.2% claim from Nov 7 was single-scenario, not comprehensive. Full matrix shows strategy underperforms.

learned_patterns: CRITICAL: Nov 3 deployed $1,600 instead of planned $8/day (200x error)
Root cause: Wrong script executed (autonomous_trader.py vs main.py)
Nov 4: All positions down 1-3% (market pullback after large entry)
Automation never properly configured (GitHub Actions disabled)
System state was stale for 5 days (Oct 30 - Nov 4)
LESSON: Need staleness detection to prevent using expired data
LESSON: Need order amount validation (reject >10x expected)
LESSON: Need proper testing before production deployment
Nov 5: MACD indicator integrated into both Tier 1 (CoreStrategy) and Tier 2 (GrowthStrategy)
MACD confirms momentum - filters out false signals from RSI alone
MACD histogram > 0 = bullish (MACD above signal line) = BUY signal
MACD histogram < 0 = bearish (MACD below signal line) = SELL signal
crypto_patterns: Nov 17: Tier 5 crypto strategy activated - BTC/ETH weekend trading
Execution schedule: Saturday & Sunday 10:00 AM ET
Strategy: 24/7 crypto markets provide weekend trading opportunities

automation.fix_applied: 2025-11-11: Upgraded protobuf to fix Python 3.14 compatibility, validated GitHub Actions workflow
